doc:
Byron Mann https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Byron_Mann 0 Byron Mann (Chinese: 文峰; pinyin: Wén Fēng; Jyutping: Man4 Fung1) is a Hong Kong-born American actor in film and television. His roles include Wing Chau in The Big Short, Chang in Hell on Wheels, Ryu in Street Fighter, Silver Lion in The Man with the Iron Fists, Admiral Nguyen in The Expanse, and Yao Fei in the first season of Arrow.Byron Mann was born in British Hong Kong (1841-1997), now Hong Kong (1997-present). Mann's father was a dentist. Mann's mother was an American-Chinese. Mann grew up bilingual in English and Cantonese. Mann attended the Diocesan Boys' School, an all-boys secondary school in Hong Kong, where he was active in community theatre as both an actor and a writer. After graduating, Mann moved to California. Byron_Mann ( Chinese : 文峰 ; pinyin : Wén_Fēng ; Jyutping : Man4_Fung1 ) is a_Hong_Kong-born_American_actor in film_and_television . His_roles include Wing_Chau in The_Big_Short , Chang in Hell on Wheels , Ryu in Street_Fighter , Silver_Lion in The_Man with the_Iron_Fists , Admiral_Nguyen in The_Expanse , and Yao_Fei in the_first_season of Arrow.Byron_Mann was_born in British_Hong_Kong (_1841-1997_) , now Hong_Kong (_1997-present_) . Mann 's_father was a_dentist . Mann 's_mother was an_American-Chinese . Mann grew up bilingual in English_and_Cantonese . Mann attended the_Diocesan_Boys '_School , an_all-boys_secondary_school in Hong_Kong , where he was active in community_theatre as both an_actor and a_writer . After graduating , Mann moved to California .
